capacity.description: The capacity of the status list. If not set, uses global STATUS_CAPACITY.

bits.description: Bits per status entry: 1 (valid/revoked), 2 (with suspended), 4/8 (extended). If not set, uses global STATUS_BITS.

ttl.description: TTL in seconds for the status list JWT. If not set, uses global STATUS_TTL.

immediateUpdate.description: If true, regenerate JWT immediately on status changes. If false (default), use lazy regeneration on TTL expiry.
